metadata.title: AW Silver 24W Nail Drill Art Dust Suction Collector Manicure Filing Acrylic Gel Machine Nail File Tool

categorization.explanation: The product is a nail drill art dust suction collector, which is used for manicure and nail care. Therefore, it fits best in the 'Nail Art & Polish' subcategory under 'Foot, Hand & Nail Care' in the 'Beauty & Personal Care' main category.
